original_text: For who maketh thee to differ from another? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive it, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received it?
korean_text: 누가 너를 남달리 구별하였느냐 네게 있는 것 중에 받지 아니한 것이 무엇이냐 네가 받았은즉 어찌하여 받지 아니한 것 같이 자랑하느냐

sentences.original_text: For who maketh thee to differ from another?
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 다른 사람과 다르게 만드는 이가 누구냐?

sentences.original_text: and what hast thou that thou didst not receive?
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 받지 않은 것이 무엇이 있느냐?

sentences.original_text: now if thou didst receive it,
as if thou hadst not received it?
